text: Omana Swapnangal is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by PK Radhakrishnan. http://www.nthwall.com/ml/Omana-Swapnangal-1976/9465402330 ==Cast== * Uma Maheswari * Ravi Varma * Jayarekha * Thodupuzha Vasanthy Lyrics: Ezhachery Ramachandran Music : Kumarakam Rajappan Singers:Yesudas,Asalatha, N.Unnikrishnan,K.P.Jinachandran ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Omana Swapnangal
